title: Film Schema
description: Schema representing a film with ownership and privacy details.

owner.description: Identifier of the user who owns the film.

private.description: Indicates whether the film is private (true) or public (false).

watchDate.description: The date when the film was watched, expressed in YYYY-MM-DD format.

rating.description: User's rating for the film, from 0 to 10.

favorite.description: Set to true if the film is among the user's favorites; false otherwise.
